text:
Welcome to the Lenya Website Redesign Contest.
You can find the documentation of the Contest here: http://lenya.apache.org/community/docudesigncontest.html

Please attach Your contributions to this Bugzilla entry. By attaching Your artwork here, it will be licensed under the terms of the Apache License 2.0 (http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html).

Thanks in advance for Your contribution to Apache Lenya - we are looking
forward to seeing your design ideas for the Lenya website!
creator: ragaller@apache.org
